Borax flux and other common flux for use in Cu/Fe/Ag/Au brazing, welding, and forging, such as fluxing copper, iron, gold, or silver. This is equivalent to about a spoonful of flux, which should generally be more than enough for most projects when smelting premade ingots or objects. For brazing, ~15g per 100g of product should be used.
